title: Starting Kit for PyTorch Deep Learning
description: Starting kit for PyTorch Deep LearningWelcome to this tutorial to get started on PyTorch for this competition. PyTorch is a promising port of Facebook's Torch to Python. It's only 3 months old but has an already promising feature set. Unfortunately it's very very raw, and I had a lot of troubles to get started with very basic things:  data loading building a basic CNN training  Hopefully this will help you getting started using PyTorch on this dataset.
